alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Forest and Florence Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whisker Lake Wilderness, or 14 miles southwest of Crystal Falls, moving east at 15 mph. Other storms were located over northern Forest County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsford, Florence, Homestead, Fern, Tipler, Popple River, Headwaters Wilderness, Wisconsin Slough Natural Area, Whisker Lake Wilderness and Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
